name: Barrel Stack
description:
Barrel Stack is my first game jam project. The game is not yet fully complete, but it is in a playable state. The aim of the game is to stack as many barrels as you can without the tower falling over!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move barrel. SPACE to place.

Source code available on Git:

https://github.com/ArchieArch1/LudumDare49
